                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| FUNCTION    | pgbouncer      | get_auth                                         | p_usename text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | TABLE(username text, password text)                                                                                                                            | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pgbouncer.get_auth(p_usename text)
 RETURNS TABLE(username text, password text)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
begin
    raise debug 'PgBouncer auth request: %', p_usename;

    return query
    select 
        rolname::text, 
        case when rolvaliduntil < now() 
            then null 
            else rolpassword::text 
        end 
    from pg_authid 
    where rolname=$1 and rolcanlogin;
end;
$function$

|
| FUNCTION    | public         | approve_inventory_request                        | p_request_id bigint, p_note text DEFAULT NULL::text, p_receive_quantity integer DEFAULT NULL::integer                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.approve_inventory_request(p_request_id bigint, p_note text DEFAULT NULL::text, p_receive_quantity integer DEFAULT NULL::integer)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_actor bigint := NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint;
    v_req RECORD;
BEGIN
    SELECT * INTO v_req FROM inventory_requests WHERE request_id = p_request_id FOR UPDATE;
    IF NOT FOUND THEN RAISE EXCEPTION 'Inventory request % not found', p_request_id; END IF;
    IF v_req.status <> 'pending' THEN RAISE EXCEPTION 'Request % is not pending (current: %)', p_request_id, v_req.status; END IF;

    UPDATE inventory_requests
       SET status='approved', decision_at=now(), decision_by=v_actor, decision_remarks=p_note, updated_at=now(), updated_by=v_actor
     WHERE request_id = p_request_id;

    -- Optional stock receive transaction
    IF p_receive_quantity IS NOT NULL AND p_receive_quantity > 0 THEN
        INSERT INTO inventorytransactions(inventory_id, transaction_type, quantity, date, remarks, performed_by, created_by)
        VALUES (v_req.inventory_id, 'RECEIVE', p_receive_quantity, now(), coalesce(p_note,'Approved request stock'), v_actor, v_actor);
    END IF;

    INSERT INTO activitylogs(action_type, actor_user_id, target_table, target_id, details)
    VALUES ('INVENTORY_REQUEST_APPROVED', v_actor, 'inventory_requests', p_request_id, jsonb_build_object('note', p_note, 'receive_quantity', p_receive_quantity));
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                      |
| FUNCTION    | public         | authenticate_user                                | p_supabase_uuid uuid                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | TABLE(user_id bigint, role character varying, firstname character varying, surname character varying, email character varying)                                 | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.authenticate_user(p_supabase_uuid uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(user_id bigint, role character varying, firstname character varying, surname character varying, email character varying)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        u.user_id,
        u.role,
        u.firstname,
        u.surname,
        u.email
    FROM users u
    JOIN user_mapping um ON u.user_id = um.user_id
    WHERE um.uuid = p_supabase_uuid;
END;
$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| FUNCTION    | public         | compute_days_overdue                             | scheduled date, status schedule_status_enum, actual date                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | integer                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.compute_days_overdue(scheduled date, status schedule_status_enum, actual date)
 RETURNS integer
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 IMMUTABLE STRICT
AS $function$
BEGIN
    IF status IN ('Pending','Scheduled','Due','Overdue') AND actual IS NULL AND scheduled < CURRENT_DATE THEN
        RETURN (CURRENT_DATE - scheduled);
    END IF;
    RETURN 0;
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_history_trigger                           | p_table text, p_pk text, p_history_table text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_history_trigger(p_table text, p_pk text, p_history_table text)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_func_name text := format('trg_%s_history_fn', p_table);
    v_trigger_name text := format('trg_%s_history', p_table);
    v_sql text;
BEGIN
    -- Create the per-table history function if missing
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_proc WHERE proname = v_func_name) THEN
        v_sql := format($f$
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION %I() RETURNS trigger
LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $body$
DECLARE
    v_version int;
    v_id bigint;
BEGIN
    -- Determine primary key value depending on operation
    IF TG_OP = 'INSERT' OR TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN
        v_id := NEW.%I;
    ELSE
        v_id := OLD.%I; -- DELETE
    END IF;

    SELECT COALESCE(MAX(version_no),0)+1 INTO v_version FROM %I WHERE %I = v_id;

    INSERT INTO %I(%I, version_no, changed_by, changed_fields, snapshot)
    VALUES (
        v_id,
        v_version,
        NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint,
        CASE WHEN TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN jsonb_diff(to_jsonb(OLD), to_jsonb(NEW)) ELSE NULL END,
        to_jsonb(CASE WHEN TG_OP = 'DELETE' THEN OLD ELSE NEW END)
    );
    RETURN NULL; -- AFTER trigger ignores return tuple
END;
$body$;
        $f$, v_func_name, p_pk, p_pk, p_history_table, p_pk, p_history_table, p_pk);
        EXECUTE v_sql;
    END IF;

    -- Create the trigger if missing
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_trigger WHERE tgname = v_trigger_name) THEN
        EXECUTE format('CREATE TRIGGER %I AFTER INSERT OR UPDATE OR DELETE ON %I FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION %I()', v_trigger_name, p_table, v_func_name);
    END IF;
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_patientschedule_on_patient_insert         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_patientschedule_on_patient_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- Delegate to canonical generator which uses schedule_master / schedule_doses
    PERFORM generate_patient_schedule(NEW.patient_id, NEW.created_by);
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$function$
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_user_mapping_on_user_insert               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_user_mapping_on_user_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- Only create mapping for users that will use Supabase auth (not for system users)
    IF NEW.role IN ('HealthWorker', 'Nurse', 'Nutritionist', 'Guardian') THEN
        -- Generate a UUID for the mapping (this will be replaced with actual Supabase UUID during auth)
        INSERT INTO user_mapping (uuid, user_id)
        VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), NEW.user_id);
    END IF;
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$function$
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_user_on_guardian_insert                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_user_on_guardian_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    existing_user_id BIGINT;
BEGIN
    -- Check if a user with the same contact number or email already exists
    SELECT user_id INTO existing_user_id
    FROM users
    WHERE contact_number = NEW.contact_number OR email = NEW.email;

    IF existing_user_id IS NULL THEN
        -- Insert a new user if no existing user is found
        INSERT INTO users (role, surname, firstname, middlename, sex, birthdate, address, contact_number, email, username, password_hash, date_registered)
        VALUES (
            'Guardian', 
            NEW.surname, 
            NEW.firstname, 
            NEW.middlename, 
            'Other', -- Default sex for guardians (can be updated later)
            NEW.birthdate, 
            NEW.address, 
            NEW.contact_number, 
            NEW.email, 
            NEW.contact_number, -- Use contact number as default username
            '', -- Default password hash (to be set by the guardian later)
            NOW()
        )
        RETURNING user_id INTO existing_user_id;
    END IF;

    -- Update the guardian's user_id with the existing or newly created user_id
    UPDATE guardians SET user_id = existing_user_id WHERE guardian_id = NEW.guardian_id;

    RETURN NEW;
END;
$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_user_with_mapping                         | p_supabase_uuid uuid, p_role character varying, p_surname character varying, p_firstname character varying, p_middlename character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_sex character varying DEFAULT 'Other'::character varying, p_birthdate date DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, p_address text DEFAULT ''::text, p_contact_number character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_email character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_username character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_password_hash text DEFAULT ''::text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | bigint                                                                                                                                                         | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_user_with_mapping(p_supabase_uuid uuid, p_role character varying, p_surname character varying, p_firstname character varying, p_middlename character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_sex character varying DEFAULT 'Other'::character varying, p_birthdate date DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, p_address text DEFAULT ''::text, p_contact_number character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_email character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_username character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_password_hash text DEFAULT ''::text)
 RETURNS bigint
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    new_user_id BIGINT;
BEGIN
    -- Insert user
    INSERT INTO users (role, surname, firstname, middlename, sex, birthdate, address, contact_number, email, username, password_hash)
    VALUES (p_role, p_surname, p_firstname, p_middlename, p_sex, p_birthdate, p_address, p_contact_number, p_email, p_username, p_password_hash)
    RETURNING user_id INTO new_user_id;
    
    -- Create mapping with actual Supabase UUID
    INSERT INTO user_mapping (uuid, user_id)
    VALUES (p_supabase_uuid, new_user_id)
    ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET uuid = p_supabase_uuid;
    
    RETURN new_user_id;
END;
$function$

| FUNCTION    | public         | current_app_role                                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | text                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.current_app_role()
 RETURNS text
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 STABLE
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN current_setting('app.current_role', true);
END; $function$

| FUNCTION    | public         | current_app_user_id                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | bigint                                                                                                                                                         | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.current_app_user_id()
 RETURNS bigint
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 STABLE
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- Expect client sets: SELECT set_config('app.current_user_id', '<id>', false);
    RETURN NULLIF(current_setting('app.current_user_id', true), '')::bigint;
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                 |
| FUNCTION    | public         | enforce_inventory_nonnegative                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.enforce_inventory_nonnegative()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
        BEGIN
            IF NEW.current_stock_level < 0 THEN
                RAISE EXCEPTION 'Inventory % would become negative (%).', NEW.inventory_id, NEW.current_stock_level;
            END IF;
            RETURN NEW;
        END;$function$
