                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| FUNCTION    | public         | refresh_immunization_cohorts                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.refresh_immunization_cohorts()
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- Existing function assumed: refresh_defaulters()
    PERFORM refresh_defaulters();
    -- Placeholder for additional cohort views (due soon, etc.) if materialized later.
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| FUNCTION    | public         | reject_inventory_request                         | p_request_id bigint, p_reason text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.reject_inventory_request(p_request_id bigint, p_reason text)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_actor bigint := NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint;
    v_req RECORD;
BEGIN
    SELECT * INTO v_req FROM inventory_requests WHERE request_id = p_request_id FOR UPDATE;
    IF NOT FOUND THEN RAISE EXCEPTION 'Inventory request % not found', p_request_id; END IF;
    IF v_req.status <> 'pending' THEN RAISE EXCEPTION 'Request % is not pending (current: %)', p_request_id, v_req.status; END IF;

    UPDATE inventory_requests
       SET status='rejected', decision_at=now(), decision_by=v_actor, decision_remarks=p_reason, updated_at=now(), updated_by=v_actor
     WHERE request_id = p_request_id;

    INSERT INTO activitylogs(action_type, actor_user_id, target_table, target_id, details)
    VALUES ('INVENTORY_REQUEST_REJECTED', v_actor, 'inventory_requests', p_request_id, jsonb_build_object('reason', p_reason));
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| FUNCTION    | public         | resolve_login_identifier                         | p_identifier text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | TABLE(user_id bigint, email text)                                                                                                                              | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.resolve_login_identifier(p_identifier text)
 RETURNS TABLE(user_id bigint, email text)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 STABLE
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_norm text := lower(trim(p_identifier));
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT u.user_id, u.email
      FROM users u
     WHERE lower(u.email) = v_norm
        OR lower(u.username) = v_norm
        OR u.contact_number = p_identifier
     LIMIT 1;
END; $function$

                |
| FUNCTION    | public         | restore_entity                                   | p_table regclass, p_id bigint                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.restore_entity(p_table regclass, p_id bigint)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_sql text;
    v_actor bigint := NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint;
BEGIN
    v_sql := format('UPDATE %s SET is_deleted=false, deleted_at=NULL, deleted_by=NULL, updated_at=now(), updated_by=%s WHERE %s = $1 AND is_deleted=true', p_table, v_actor, (SELECT a.attname FROM pg_index i JOIN pg_attribute a ON a.attrelid=i.indrelid AND a.attnum = ANY(i.indkey) WHERE i.indrelid=p_table AND i.indisprimary LIMIT 1));
    EXECUTE v_sql USING p_id;
    INSERT INTO activitylogs(action_type, actor_user_id, target_table, target_id, details)
    VALUES ('ENTITY_RESTORED', v_actor, p_table::text, p_id, NULL);
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| FUNCTION    | public         | restore_row                                      | p_table text, p_id_name text, p_id_value bigint, p_user_id bigint                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.restore_row(p_table text, p_id_name text, p_id_value bigint, p_user_id bigint)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
DECLARE
    sql text;
    v_action action_type_enum;
BEGIN
    v_action := CASE p_table
        WHEN 'users' THEN 'USER_RESTORED'
        WHEN 'patients' THEN 'PATIENT_RESTORED'
        WHEN 'patientschedule' THEN 'SCHEDULE_STATUS_CHANGED'
        WHEN 'immunizations' THEN 'VACCINE_ADMINISTERED'
        WHEN 'inventory' THEN 'INVENTORY_STOCK_UPDATED'
        ELSE 'USER_RESTORED' END;

    sql := format('UPDATE %I SET is_deleted=false, deleted_at=NULL, deleted_by=NULL, updated_at=now(), updated_by=$1 WHERE %I=$2 AND is_deleted=true', p_table, p_id_name);
    EXECUTE sql USING p_user_id, p_id_value;

    INSERT INTO activitylogs(action_type, actor_user_id, target_table, target_id, details)
    VALUES (v_action, p_user_id::uuid, p_table, p_id_value, jsonb_build_object('restored', true));
END; $function$

                                                        |
| FUNCTION    | public         | secure_status_change                             | p_user_id bigint, p_new_status text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.secure_status_change(p_user_id bigint, p_new_status text)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
DECLARE v_actor bigint := NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint; v_old text; BEGIN
    SELECT status INTO v_old FROM users WHERE user_id = p_user_id FOR UPDATE;
    IF NOT FOUND THEN RAISE EXCEPTION 'User % not found', p_user_id; END IF;
    IF v_old = p_new_status THEN RETURN; END IF;
    UPDATE users SET status = p_new_status, updated_at = now(), updated_by = v_actor WHERE user_id = p_user_id;
    INSERT INTO activitylogs(action_type, actor_user_id, target_table, target_id, details)
    VALUES ('USER_STATUS_CHANGED', v_actor, 'users', p_user_id, jsonb_build_object('old', v_old, 'new', p_new_status));
END; $function$

| FUNCTION    | public         | set_app_context                                  | p_user_id bigint, p_role text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.set_app_context(p_user_id bigint, p_role text)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
BEGIN
    PERFORM set_config('app.user_id', p_user_id::text, true);
    PERFORM set_config('app.role', p_role, true);
END; $function$

| FUNCTION    | public         | soft_delete_cascade_guardians                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.soft_delete_cascade_guardians()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    UPDATE patients SET is_deleted = TRUE, deleted_at = NOW(), deleted_by = NEW.deleted_by WHERE guardian_id = NEW.guardian_id;
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$function$

| FUNCTION    | public         | soft_delete_cascade_patients                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.soft_delete_cascade_patients()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    UPDATE visits SET is_deleted = TRUE, deleted_at = NOW(), deleted_by = NEW.deleted_by WHERE patient_id = NEW.patient_id;
    UPDATE patientschedule SET is_deleted = TRUE, deleted_at = NOW(), deleted_by = NEW.deleted_by WHERE patient_id = NEW.patient_id;
    UPDATE birthhistory SET is_deleted = TRUE, deleted_at = NOW(), deleted_by = NEW.deleted_by WHERE patient_id = NEW.patient_id;
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| FUNCTION    | public         | soft_delete_row                                  | p_table text, p_id_name text, p_id_value bigint, p_user_id bigint                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.soft_delete_row(p_table text, p_id_name text, p_id_value bigint, p_user_id bigint)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
DECLARE
    sql text;
    v_action action_type_enum;
BEGIN
    -- Map action type
    v_action := CASE p_table
        WHEN 'users' THEN 'USER_DELETED'
        WHEN 'patients' THEN 'PATIENT_DELETED'
        WHEN 'patientschedule' THEN 'SCHEDULE_STATUS_CHANGED'
        WHEN 'immunizations' THEN 'VACCINE_ADMINISTERED' -- ambiguous, keep existing taxonomy
        WHEN 'inventory' THEN 'INVENTORY_STOCK_UPDATED'
        ELSE 'USER_DELETED' END; -- fallback

    sql := format('UPDATE %I SET is_deleted=true, deleted_at=now(), deleted_by=$1 WHERE %I=$2 AND is_deleted=false', p_table, p_id_name);
    EXECUTE sql USING p_user_id, p_id_value;

    INSERT INTO activitylogs(action_type, actor_user_id, target_table, target_id, details)
    VALUES (v_action, p_user_id::uuid, p_table, p_id_value, jsonb_build_object('soft_delete', true));
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| FUNCTION    | public         | soft_delete_row                                  | p_table text, p_id_name text, p_id_value bigint, p_user_id bigint, p_action text DEFAULT 'DELETE'::text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | void                                                                                                                                                           | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.soft_delete_row(p_table text, p_id_name text, p_id_value bigint, p_user_id bigint, p_action text DEFAULT 'DELETE'::text)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
DECLARE
    sql text;
BEGIN
    sql := format('UPDATE %I SET is_deleted=true, deleted_at=now(), deleted_by=$1 WHERE %I=$2 AND is_deleted=false', p_table, p_id_name);
    EXECUTE sql USING p_user_id, p_id_value;
    INSERT INTO activitylogs(user_id, action_type, entity_type, entity_id, old_value, new_value, timestamp)
    VALUES (p_user_id, CASE WHEN p_action='DELETE' THEN 'USER_DELETED' ELSE 'USER_DELETED' END, p_table, p_id_value, NULL, NULL, now());
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| FUNCTION    | public         | trg_activitylogs_partition                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.trg_activitylogs_partition()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    PERFORM ensure_activitylogs_partition(NEW.timestamp);
    RETURN NEW;
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| FUNCTION    | public         | trg_deworming_history_fn                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.trg_deworming_history_fn()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_version int;
    v_id bigint;
BEGIN
    -- Determine primary key value depending on operation
    IF TG_OP = 'INSERT' OR TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN
        v_id := NEW.deworming_id;
    ELSE
        v_id := OLD.deworming_id; -- DELETE
    END IF;

    SELECT COALESCE(MAX(version_no),0)+1 INTO v_version FROM deworming_history WHERE deworming_id = v_id;

    INSERT INTO deworming_history(deworming_id, version_no, changed_by, changed_fields, snapshot)
    VALUES (
        v_id,
        v_version,
        NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint,
        CASE WHEN TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN jsonb_diff(to_jsonb(OLD), to_jsonb(NEW)) ELSE NULL END,
        to_jsonb(CASE WHEN TG_OP = 'DELETE' THEN OLD ELSE NEW END)
    );
    RETURN NULL; -- AFTER trigger ignores return tuple
END;
$function$
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| FUNCTION    | public         | trg_generic_history                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.trg_generic_history()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_version int;
    v_pk_col text; -- not used but placeholder for extensibility
    v_changed jsonb := NULL;
    v_actor_text text := NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true), '');
    v_target_id bigint;
BEGIN
    IF TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN
        v_changed := jsonb_diff(to_jsonb(OLD), to_jsonb(NEW));
        -- Remove noise fields if present
        v_changed := (SELECT CASE WHEN v_changed ? 'updated_at' THEN v_changed - 'updated_at' ELSE v_changed END);
        IF v_changed = '{}'::jsonb THEN
            RETURN NEW; -- no meaningful change
        END IF;
    END IF;

    -- Resolve target primary key value dynamically via JSONB extraction
    IF TG_OP = 'INSERT' OR TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN
        v_target_id := (to_jsonb(NEW)->>TG_ARGV[0])::bigint;
    ELSE
        v_target_id := (to_jsonb(OLD)->>TG_ARGV[0])::bigint;
    END IF;

    EXECUTE format('SELECT COALESCE(MAX(version_no),0)+1 FROM %I WHERE %I = $1', TG_ARGV[1], TG_ARGV[0]) INTO v_version USING v_target_id;

    EXECUTE format('INSERT INTO %I(%I, version_no, changed_by, changed_fields, snapshot) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5)', TG_ARGV[1], TG_ARGV[0])
    USING v_target_id, v_version, v_actor_text::bigint, v_changed, to_jsonb(CASE WHEN TG_OP='DELETE' THEN OLD ELSE NEW END);

    RETURN NULL; -- AFTER trigger
END; $function$

                 |
| FUNCTION    | public         | trg_immunization_issue_inventory                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                        | null                                                         | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.trg_immunization_issue_inventory()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    IF NEW.inventory_id IS NOT NULL THEN
        INSERT INTO inventorytransactions(inventory_id, transaction_type, quantity, date, remarks, performed_by, created_by)
        VALUES (NEW.inventory_id, 'ISSUE', 1, now(), 'Auto decrement for immunization '||NEW.immunization_id, NEW.administered_by, NEW.administered_by);
    END IF;
    RETURN NEW;
END; $function$
